name: press9 A/B Testing
author: Mark DiMarco

sections.description:
press9-ab-testing makes calls to press9’s API in order to collect data for a running test. No new tables are necessary within WordPress.
Data is tracked in real-time, so you can log into press9 and check the status of a test at any time.

To run a test:

  1. Install and activate the press9-ab-testing plugin
  2. Log into press9formoreoptions.com and click ‘Create a test’
  3. Enter the URL of the page you want to test into the Test Designer
  4. Make a HTML or CSS edit and click “Next” when you are done
  5. Copy and paste the generated javascript into the “Test Script” area of the press9-ab-testing administrative panel in wordpress.
  6. Update the “Goal Script” by replacing “GROUP-TOKEN” and “TEST-TOKEN” with the proper tokens.
  7. Select the Test Page(which pages you want to swap the content on) and the Goal Page(which pages you consider a goal)

That’s it. To check on a test and view results, log into press9
sections.installation:
Installation is simple as there are no new tables to create.

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I run more than one test at a time?

Currently, no. If you need to, you can contact the author and ask to add this option.

short_description: press9-ab-testing lets you create A/B tests from press9's test designer and run the test within WordPress.
